docs.text: As source to implementing this lib, I used mLabs Android Implementation Android Lib.
docs.title: Speedtest

docs.text: speedtest is deployed on bintray (jcenter).
docs.title: maven

docs.text:
sbt libraryDependencies += "com.quadstingray" %% "speedtest" % "0.6.2" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>com.quadstingray</groupId>
  <artifactId>speedtest_2.13</artifactId>
  <version>0.6.2</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'com.quadstingray', name: 'speedtest_2.13', version: '0.6.2'
}
docs.title: SBT

docs.text: Full Test Download Test Upload Test
docs.title: Samples

docs.text:
sbt libraryDependencies += "com.quadstingray" %% "speedtest" % "0.6.2" Maven <dependency>
  <groupId>com.quadstingray</groupId>
  <artifactId>speedtest_2.13</artifactId>
  <version>0.6.2</version>
</dependency> Gradle dependencies {
  compile group: 'com.quadstingray', name: 'speedtest_2.13', version: '0.6.2'
}
docs.title: Adding To build.sbt

docs.text:
The Framework choose the automatic method to find best server.
val speedTestResult = SpeedTest.runTest()
docs.title: Run Auto Full Test

docs.text:
When you setup you test with an not existing Server. The Framework choose the automatic method to find best server.
val speedTestResult = SpeedTest.runTest(
  Some(Server("fra05", "ndt-iupui-mlab1-fra05.measurement-lab.org", "Frankfurt", "DE", List("193.142.125.24", "2a01:3e0:ff20:401::24")))
)
docs.title: Run Full Test with specific Server

docs.text:
With CallBacks you can update your UI do somethings at running the test.
var dlCount        = 0
var dlBandwidthSum = 0.0
def dlCallBack(result: MeasurementResult): Unit = {
  dlCount += 1
  dlBandwidthSum += result.bandwidth.bytePerSeconds
}

var upCount        = 0
var upBandwidthSum = 0.0
def upCallBack(result: MeasurementResult): Unit = {
  upCount += 1
  upBandwidthSum += result.bandwidth.bytePerSeconds
}

val speedTestResult = SpeedTest.runTest(downloadMeasurementCallBack = dlCallBack, uploadMeasurementCallBack = upCallBack)
docs.title: Run Full Test with CallBacks
